item.title: How to install InvoiceNinja on Ubuntu Server
item.description: This is a tutorial I’ve written mostly for my own purposes that I have adapted from the orginal post from [TechnicallyComputers](Install Invoice Ninja v5 on Ubuntu 20.04 - v5 Self-hosted - Discourse). Kudos to him! Prerequisites Fresh Ubuntu Server install on a VPS / VM with sudo access. Optional: A domain pointed at the server. Install necessary (and extra) software First, update the system.
